title: IP Sprint Topics
description:
Description
The code quality of the POT implementation is constantly managed and improved where needed. The dimensions reliability, security and maintainability are covered. The API definition follows the API guidelines defined by Deutsche Telekom.
acceptance_criteria: Code is refactored and therefore more easy to be maintained
The API linting reports no violations (errors) for the POT v3 API
SonarQube reports reliability as  "A" level for the overall code
SonarQube reports security as "A" level for the overall code
SonarQube reports maintainability as "A" level for the overall code
